sub_topic: Using the power rule to differentiate functions
message_1: What is the derivative of the function f(x) = 8x^5 - 3x^3 + 2x - 9 using the power rule?
message_2:
Using the power rule, the derivative of the function f(x) = 8x^5 - 3x^3 + 2x - 9 is:

f'(x) = (5 * 8)x^(5-1) - (3 * 3)x^(3-1) + 2

f'(x) = 40x^4 - 9x^2 + 2
